divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on my back porch watching a very bright light at dusk & realizing it was not a star . It would drop in the sky about 2 feet until it was behind trees ! Came insisde & told my husband & then he went to the front yard & called me out there was 7 " unidentified flying Objects " that circled above our house for 2-3 hrs . I have watched many planes , helicopters & jets fly over my home in the 23 yrs I have lived here and these were not any of the above !! Very quiet and would just circle , following one another tried to get pictures but all ya really see is a light in the sky !! This is not an airplane , jet or helicopter , this has been going on approx . since the end of June & almost every night between 9 pm & 11 pm !! I was very shocked , and had to call my children to have them see these objects !!
Summary: Objects flying around area for approx . 2-3 hrs bright light then will move & see flashing & very slow moving.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around August 8th 2010
